column4: Just because i haven't tried it yet, will Ubuntu boot from an external USB HDD?

I think my primary OS just changed from windows :)

in Calculator: View-->Scientific.... got square log sin and all that scary crap! :-)
that's the current long term support version. got it on my laptop, all our desktops and all our servers
